title: SteelSeries Arctis 5
description: Surround sound RGB gaming headset with the best mic and stunning hearing!

title: Logitech GPRO X Headset
description: Designed with and for pros. Next-gen 7.1 surround sound and PRO-G 50 mm drivers ensure premium gaming audio.

title: Razer Huntsman mini
description: 60% gaming keyboard with Razer™ Optical Switch

title: SteelSeries Apex Pro TKL
description: The next leap in mechanical keyboards. With the World's fastest switch.

title: Logitech GPRO Superlight
description: Less than 63 grams. Advanced low-latency LIGHTSPEED wireless. Sub-micron precision with HERO 25K sensor. Remove all obstacles with our lightest and fastest PRO mouse ever.

title: Cooler Master RGB Hard Gaming
description: The RGB Hard Gaming Mousepad is a vibrant, durable mousepad built for pro-level gaming. It features a low-friction surface optimized for optical and laser mice sensors.

title: Logitech G640
description: Large size, 400 x 460 mm, for more space and mouse movement. Rubber base stays in place for intense gaming. Surface texture is optimized for Logitech G mice and peak gaming performance.

title: Logitech GPRO X Keyboard
description: The tournament-proven PRO design, now with your choice of swappable pro-grade GX mechanical switches: Clicky, Tactile and Linear. Built to win in collaboration with the world’s top esports athletes.

title: SteelSeries Rival 650
description: The first true performance wireless heavy mouse with the fastest charging ever.

title: SteelSeries QCK Heavy
description: The most used hard gaming cloth mousepad.

title: Razer Viper mini
description: ULTRA-LIGHT. ULTRA-FAST. Born to push the very limits of ultra-lightweight gaming, the Razer Viper Mini takes up a smaller form that remains just as big in performance.

title: Razer Kraken
description: Equipped with 7.1 surround sound software so you can experience accurate positional audio when gaming—you'll be able to pick up the direction of where the action is coming from so you're ready to pounce into a gunfight.

title: Razer Sphex V2 Hardpad
description: Gain the winning edge with the Razer Sphex V2—the latest iteration of our thinnest hard gaming mouse mat, now 20% thinner and available in a larger size.

title: Xtrfy K4 TKL RGB
description: Tenkeyless mechanical gaming keyboard with perfect xtrfy switches made for gamers.

title: Xtrfy H2 Pro
description: The H2 is a gaming headset ready for competition. Extra large over-ear cups. Thick memory foam cushions. Durable, low-weight construction.

title: Cooler Master MM711
description: The MM711 is a truly innovative mouse that does more with so much less.

title: Cooler Master MH650
description: The MH650 Gaming Headset provides an immersive experience in a portable package ideal for console and PC gamers.

title: Cooler Master Masterkeys Pro
description: Elevate your game with the MasterKeys line of gaming keyboards and focus on what really matters: no-nonsense performance in a straightforward package.
